article_title: Shortage of psychiatrists being addressed by lawmakers, health care industry
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: NEW YORK (AP) — A severe shortage of psychiatrists in the United States has policymakers and health care providers wringing their hands.In many parts of the country, patients have lengthy drives to reach the nearest psychiatrist, if they can even find one willing to see them.In Texas, which faces a severe shortage, psychiatrists are being actively recruited by lawmakers, who recently voted to pay the student loans of psychiatrists willing to work in underserved areas. A bill in
article_metadata.author: David Crary AP National Writer
